title: Southern Great Barrier Reef Apartment Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover coastal Queensland's best-kept secret: Seventeen Seventy. Enjoy award-winning resort-style facilities with all the convenience of a self-contained apartment at 1770 Lagoons Central Apartment Resort, perfect for couples and families alike with a surf beach and idyllic bay within easy reach. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a welcome bottle of wine, two A$25 credits for Anjea Day Spa, an A$50 food and drinks credit for Plantation Restaurant, complimentary parking and a leisurely 11am guaranteed late checkout.

**Travelling as a group?** Check out the Two-Bedroom upgrades valid for four people.
offer_address: Cnr Beaches Village Circuit & Captain Cook Drive, Agnes Water/1770, QLD
